outputs.output_descr: The Programme at hand aims to contribute to the establishment of an inclusive governance model for regional development at the regional level through a holistic and sustainable approach, including i) the conduct of gap analysis on inclusive governance for selected DAs; ii) development of Guideline for Participation; iii) design and conduct of training seminars on methods of partnership/participation; iv) development of a framework for  action for the scale up of the participatory processes at regional level.

project_descr: Project aims to contribute to the establishment of a governance model for regional development of the DAs through a holistic approach.
project_title: Improvement of Mechanisms for Governance of DAs
